outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to make Kenya's energy policy responsive to the national environmental protection and poverty reduction needs as well as economic and trade imperatives, by involving key stakeholders in analysing implications of different energy policy options. The initiative had four objectives;  generating information and acquiring strategic insight into a certain sustainable development context in order to identify critical sustainability issues; to identify policy options that take into account sustainability goals and objectives and to define sustainability criteria and indicators. Lastly, IAP aimed to build commitment for sustainable development in a certain sector, region or at the national level.

project_descr: Enhancing capacity for Integrated Assessment and Planning for sustainable development in Kenya  The Case of the Global Village Partnership Energy Poverty Reduction Plan
